title: Prophecy of the Seven Bottles
description: “Prophecy of the Seven Bottles” is about a young computer intern in the 1980s who is abducted by aliens and awakens with a strange device with no memory of what happened. 30 years later he discovers that it’s an extra terrestrial computer programmed to fulfill a secret church prophecy to help save humanity in the end times and bring in a new era of peace and enlightenment.
author: Scott Troy Kovarik
